title: This assignment will help you to recollect the syntax and semantics while writing and executing a java program.

quizDescription.text: Use the below code for answering the following questions

questions.questionText: Describe what happens if you omit ; in the above code
Describe what happens if you omit the first " in the above code
Describe what happens if you omit the second " in the above code
Describe what happens if you omit the first { in the above code
Describe what happens if you omit the second { in the above code
Describe what happens if you omit the first } in the above code
Describe what happens if you omit the second } in the above code
